Summary: I was told by 2 coworkers that they seen this event 2 weeks earlier. (they told me before i actually seen the same)
trends: There has been one other sighting in Brocton
There were no other sightings in Brocton on or around May 4th 2013
divs: sighting detailsi was told by 2 coworkers that they seen these lights , objects, etc, 2 weeks, on a saturday, before i did. i seen 5 orange ufo's back in june 1984, which was also witnessed by several others including law enforcement. i have always studied the skies since my exp. in 1974. after my 2 co workers told me their story, which i believed them, as i interviewed the seperately, i just kind of kept their stories in my thoughts. on 04may13, my only day off of work, i started to do work around the house, as the weather was starting to let us all get some outdoor duties done. my friends described their incident as follows: sighted was approx. 25-30 red circular lights, very high up, no sounds & observed for about 15 mins. but, they said that the 25-30 were being led by a lone red light or? ahead of them.. when i seen them 2 weeks later, there were the same amt of lights, in a non formation pattern & at least 5 of them, breaking formation & doing little lite tricks or showing off if you will. but in my case, the lone ufo, (lite or ?) was at the rear of the undisciplined formation. i observed them for approx. 21 mins. i watched them till they disappeared. during this timetable, a jet airliner was above. it was moving at its reg speed, with red\green lights. the ufo's, which were much, much higher were moving slow except for when the 5 were doing their little tricks for us, on earth to see. i know that these were ufo's as i have been amazed by them since 1974.my feelings are that, i remained calm . i enjoyed seeing them, once again & i would share my story with anyone who wants to hear it. i was a member of mufon, many years ago then dropped out due to military commitments. i would like to rejoin.
